generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and serene watercolor painting that brings peaceful closure. The design features the single, giant, ornate picture frame from the front cover, now completely empty and leaning gently against a large, leafy green plant. The scene is calm, with soft light filtering through. The composition is focused on the left and center, leaving the bottom-right corner area completely clear and undecorated. The artwork uses the same soft color palette and watercolor style with visible paper texture and organic paint bleeds, offering a quiet, artistic conclusion to the card's story.
generatedPrompts.frontCover:
A humorous and lighthearted watercolor painting of a cartoon couple, Jordan and Lao Lao, styled with simplified, charming features. They are standing back-to-back in a playful, slightly dramatic pose inside a giant, ornate, empty picture frame that is sitting in the middle of a beautiful, sunlit field of wildflowers. Jordan, on the left, strikes a confident pose, winking, while Lao Lao, on the right, has a hand on her hip and is laughing. The overall scene has a soft, glowing light. Centered below them, written in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script, is the text "Happy Birthday Lao Lao". The style is whimsical watercolor with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds. Key elements and faces are kept away from the edges.

CRITICAL CHARACTER REFERENCE INSTRUCTIONS: I have provided a reference photo as input image. You MUST create cartoon/illustrated characters that accurately represent the people in this reference photo with high fidelity to their appearance.

MANDATORY CHARACTER MATCHING REQUIREMENTS:
- REPRESENT ALL PEOPLE: If multiple reference photos are provided, create cartoon versions of ALL people shown, bringing them together in the same scene
- EXACT hair color, hair style, and hair length from each reference photo
- PRECISE facial features for each person: eye color, eye shape, nose shape, face structure, skin tone
- ACCURATE clothing: replicate the EXACT clothing items, colors, patterns, and styles worn by each person in their reference photo
- COMPLETE accessories: include ALL accessories visible on each person (glasses, jewelry, hats, watches, bags, etc.)
- CORRECT body proportions and posture as shown for each person in their reference
- FAITHFUL age representation and gender presentation for each individual
- AUTHENTIC facial expressions and poses from the reference images, lean towards making the people look happier unless the user specifically asks for a different expression
- GROUP COMPOSITION: If multiple people, arrange them naturally together in a pleasing composition that fits the card's theme

Study every detail of the people in the reference image and recreate them as stylized cartoon characters while maintaining 100% accuracy to their distinctive visual features. The characters must be immediately recognizable as the same people from the reference photo. Pay special attention to clothing details, accessories, and unique personal style elements that make each person distinctive.

The cartoon style should be charming and artistic while preserving complete visual accuracy to the reference photo. Every person in the reference must be represented with their exact appearance, clothing, and accessories.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A highly creative and funny watercolor illustration depicting a ridiculously opulent, over-the-top gift box. The box is wrapped in shimmering gold paper with a massive, elaborate bow made of what looks like spun sugar or clouds. It's so large it barely fits on the page, with tiny, sparkling diamonds and stars floating around it, hinting at an impossibly expensive gift inside. The background is a soft wash of pastel colors. The tone is humorous and exaggerated, setting up the joke on the right page. The style is a consistent watercolor painting with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, and paper texture.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A beautiful watercolor design featuring the funny and lighthearted message integrated into the artwork. The background is a soft, warm watercolor wash. In the center, the message is written in an elegant, legible, handwritten cursive script: "Happy Birthday to my wonderful girlfriend, Lao Lao! I was going to get you a ridiculously expensive gift, but then I remembered my presence is priceless. You're welcome! I love you more than anything. Love, Jordan". The text is artistically framed by a whimsical, hand-painted 'PRICELESS' price tag that hangs from a delicate, painted ribbon at the top. The tag itself is decorated with subtle, shimmering gold leaf details, tying into the gift theme from the left page. The style maintains the elegant watercolor look with soft colors, artistic brush strokes, and paper texture.
